S. Menini

R. Zamparelli
dcterms:description: The SICK dataset includes around 10,000 English sentence pairs that are annotated to have either 'Entailment', 'Neutral' or 'Contradictory' relations.
dcterms:title: SICK

dcterms:creator: R. Cooper
D. Crouch
J. Van Eijck

dcterms:description: The FraCaS dataset is used for testing natural language inference systems and includes various linguistic phenomena.
dcterms:title: FraCaS

dcterms:creator: T. Khot
A. Sabharwal
P. Clark
dcterms:description: SciTail is a textual entailment dataset derived from science question answering, designed to evaluate models on their ability to understand scientific texts.
dcterms:title: SciTail

dcterms:creator: A. Williams
N. Nangia
S. Bowman
dcterms:description: SNLI is a broad-coverage challenge corpus for sentence understanding through inference, providing a large dataset for training and evaluating models.
dcterms:title: SNLI

dcterms:creator: A. Williams
N. Nangia
S. Bowman
dcterms:description: MNLI is a broad-coverage challenge corpus for sentence understanding through inference, similar to SNLI but designed for multi-genre contexts.
dcterms:title: MNLI
